overview: The dictator, an iron-fisted leader intolerant of opposing political views, sees non-believers of his rule as enemies and fronts for imperialists who have to be stopped. He summons his number-one henchman, Bazooka, and dispatches him into the streets to find out what is happening and what the people think of him and his government, while in the streets the citizens struggle for their voice to be heard.
title: Super Patriots and Morons
